title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 § 1010.2 - Description
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 § 1010.2 - Description

State Regulations

This regulation outlines the procedures to be followed by
each facility in the testing of suspected contraband drugs. The department
currently utilizes two testing systems, the Safariland NIK® poly testing
system, and the Sirchie NARK® II drug testing system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
§
1010.2

Amended

New

York State Register April 13, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 15, eff. 4/13/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
